author: aslom
msg: Eran Chinthaka: a proposed SAAJ like api for OM for Engine/ Handlers developer convenience.

author: felicity
msg: scan_directory() duplicated all the code from scan_file(), so we may as well just call scan_file()...  internally the message list is kept as a hash, with the value being the receive date.  in the case of opt_n, that used to be the message number, but is now typically -1, so we don't need to sort the message list by value, nor do we need to keep track of message count in the 1 place that tried to track it.  added in some comments, and moved some code around for easier reading/efficiency.

author: djencks
msg: fix the stuff I broke in axis.  The generated samples don't compile, I don't know why

author: craigmcc
msg: Decouple this class from requiring Struts, so that it can be used outside.
